title: Tempeh and vegetable casserole
ingredients: ['1 1/2 teaspoons olive oil', '1/8 teaspoon red chilli flakes', '1 leek, sliced', '60g (2 oz) shallots, chopped', '90g (3 oz) fresh red pepper, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '250g (9 oz) baby carrots, halved', '110g (4 oz) diced courgette', '225g (8 oz) seasoned tempeh', '110ml (4 fl oz) dry sherry', '1 tomato, chopped', '1 tablespoon soy sauce or tamari']
